short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects to a random Wikipedia page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The purpose of the project is to create a Chrome extension that redirects to a random Wikipedia page when the user clicks on it. This extension also has the ability to open random pages based on the user's preferred language and category.
